transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .minimize{display:none}.window-style{box-sizing:border-box;display:flex;flex-flow:column;margin:0;max-width:100vw!important;padding:0;touch-action:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;user-select:none}.fullscreen{margin:0;padding:0;transition:all .5s ease;width:100%!important}.content,.fullscreen{height:var(--fullscreen)!important}.content{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-grow:1;overflow:hidden;overflow-x:hidden;padding:var(--content-padding-top) var(--content-padding-right) var(--content-padding-bottom) var(--content-padding-left)}.top-bar{background:#00007c}.icon-image{height:15px;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:5px;margin-top:0;width:15px}.top-bar-window{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;margin:2px;padding:2px;width:auto;z-index:10}.top-bar-deactivated{background:#7b7d7b}.top-bar:hover{cursor:default}.window-name{align-items:center;color:#fff;display:flex;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;margin:0 0 0 3px;padding:0}.subject{background:none;border:none;width:100%}p{color:#9b9b9b;font-size:14px;margin:0;padding:0}button{outline:none}hr{background-color:hsla(0,0%,61%,.2);width:100%}.sent{background:silver;border-color:#fafafa #5a5a5a #5a5a5a #fafafa;border-style:solid;border-width:1.5px;box-shadow:1.5px 1.5px #000;padding:1px;vertical-align:middle}.sent:active{background:repeating-conic-gradient(#bdbebd 0 25%,#fff 0 50%) 50% /2px 2px;border-bottom:1.5px solid #fafafa;border-right:1.5px solid #fafafa;border-top:1.5px solid #000;box-shadow:none}.border-box{align-items:center;border:1px solid transparent;display:flex;justify-content:center}.border:active{border:1px dotted #000}.sent:hover{cursor:pointer}.container-details{background:#fff;border:1px solid #fff;margin:0;padding:0;width:100%}.header{font-size:24px;font-weight:700;margin-left:8px;max-width:auto;overflow:auto;padding-top:10px;text-overflow:ellipsis}.send-bar{border:1px solid #fff;font-size:12px;margin:2px;outline:1px solid #7b7d7b;padding:4px}.receipient{background:#c2d6fc;border-radius:3px;font-size:14px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px}.from-container,.subject-container{align-items:center;display:flex;height:35px!important}input{outline:none}textarea{background:none;border-color:#000 #fafafa #fafafa #000;border-radius:0;border-style:solid;border-width:1.5px;box-shadow:none;caret-color:#000;color:#000;flex-grow:1;font-size:14px;margin:0;resize:none;width:100%!important}
